title: What mistake happened by you during your 11th and 12th prep. So that it will help me? - Quora

response.answer_text: In 11 I m not aware from first what to do what to read after 6 months I got aware of all that. For PCM or PCB From my experiences I suggest that from 3rd day of your school buy Dinesh Vol.1 and Vol-2 of physics,chem,biology.And for maths buy NCERT.For English buy Exam Idea. In 12 Buy Arihant chapterwise for PCB and for maths buy Exam idea same for English . In 12 I also done same you will get surely above 80–85.
